revised_title: On the Osmotic Pressure of Compressible Solutions with Volatile Solvent and Solute
tldr: The author investigates the osmotic pressure of compressible solutions with both solvent and solute being volatile. They derive an exact relation between vapor pressures and osmotic pressure, providing a formula for osmotic pressure in these cases. The study also examines the connection between shrinkage and the specific volume of the solution.
